org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.custom.controllers

Class XboxController.Thumbstick

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Trigger
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button
        • org.usfirst.frc4904.standard.custom.controllers.XboxController.Thumbstick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable
    Enclosing class:
    XboxController

    public static class XboxController.Thumbstick
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button
    This class is used to represent the thumbsticks on the Xbox360 controller.
